text:
Engineer Notebook

Take a look at your brainstorms and sketches and think about you work in class today. In the text and sketch boxes below, note anything important you learned about idea generation, any questions you have, any design ideas or sketches or whatever else you want to write about!

You can write or sketch in the boxes below (or do both). You do not need to write in complete sentences. If you don't know what to write about, you can answer some (or all) of these questions:

  • What do you think you did well in today's lesson? What do you want to improve?
  • Do you think idea generation is a useful practice? Why or why not?

Documentation

Document your design process. Take your engineer notebook from today's lesson, all three of your 5 minute brainstorms and all your collaborative sketches. Add them to the Learning Journal.
